snippet: The Van Heyst Group helps companies organize live events and translate them into print, video and Web products.
abstract: Van Heyst Group, started by Della van Heyst and now run by her daughter Carrie, helps companies organize live events and turn them into products for print, video and Web distribution; media businesses represent half its clients, and revenue has risen to $2 million; firm is diversifying with a new proprietary software tool.
lead_paragraph: The Van Heyst Group helps companies organize live events and translate them into print, video and Web products.

headline.seo: Van Heyst Group Aims to Turn Company Events Into Media Gold
headline.main: Mining the Power (and the Profit) of Conversation
headline.print_headline: Mining the Power (and the Profit) of Conversation
